Text:
Hi 20-40,

Jon

Will have to wait for more seeds before downloading but REALLY looking forward to this series.

@Jon: Even if I have watched only first two episodes ever, because of your kindness and respect, I made that additional effort and downloaded 1400MB of extras (these two seems like appropriate ones). Glad you like it...
